mapper.sql: creation_timestamp as creationTimestamp, creation_user as creationUser, lastupdate_timestamp as lastupdateTimestamp, lastupdate_user as lastupdateUser

#{creation_timestamp, javaType=java.sql.Date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{creation_user, javaType=INTEGER, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastupdate_timestamp, javaType=java.sql.Date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastupdate_user, javaType=INTEGER, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select id, status_id as statusId, working_field as workingField,
from questionaire_t limit #{skip},#{size}

select id, status_id as statusId, working_field as workingField,
from questionaire_t where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into questionaire_t(status_id, working_field, active_date_start, active_date_end, ) values( #{statusId, javaType=INTEGER, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workingField, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeDateStart, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activeDateEnd, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creationTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creationUser, javaType=INTEGER, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationUsername, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastupdateTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastupdateUser, javaType=INTEGER, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastupdateUsername, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
